stat_token.name: Stat Token
stat_token.description: Use to increase one of your stats by 1

devils_elixir.name: The Devil's Elixir
devils_elixir.description:
A cursed tincture made by alchemists and tempered by demons.
Increases all of your stats by 3 at a cost...

painting_0.name: Abyss Depiction
painting_0.description: It's pure black -- the label on it says 'The Abyss'

painting_1.name: Cell Diagram
painting_1.description: A stipled diagram of what's labelled as a 'primieval cell'

painting_2.name: Plant Painting
painting_2.description: A painting of tree in a meadow

painting_3.name: Fish Sketch
painting_3.description: A sketch depicting schooling fish traversing the seas

painting_4.name: Depiction of Man
painting_4.description: A painting that depicts Adam from the Book of Genesis

painting_5.name: Painting of the End
painting_5.description:
A painting that depicts a great smog in the sky,
 above remnants of advanced architecture

rope_key.name: Rope Key
rope_key.description: A key bearing the emblem of a hangman's rope

stone_spoon.name: Stone Spoon
stone_spoon.description: A large spoon carved from stone

stone_fork.name: Stone Fork
stone_fork.description: A large fork carved from stone

jewel_claymore.name: Bejeweled Claymore
jewel_claymore.description:
A jewel-encrusted claymore:
Unfit for use in combat but it would look great as a decoration

jewel_shield.name: Bejeweled Shield
jewel_shield.description:
A large shield adorned with many valuable gems
Unusable in combat but it makes for quite dazzling decor

butcher_cleaver.name: Butcher's Cleaver
butcher_cleaver.description:
A cleaver used by a butcher.
The blade looks like it's never been sharpened,
so it looks more like a decoration than anything else.

helmet_key.name: Helmet Key
helmet_key.description: A key bearing the emblem of a royal guard's helmet

dulled_katana.name: Dulled Katana
dulled_katana.description:
A blade that's almost entirely dull.
Mostly from lack of care between many uses

cracked_spear.name: Cracked Broadhead-Spear
cracked_spear.description: A knights' spear with several hairline cracks down the tip

rusty_zweihander.name: Rusty Zweihander
rusty_zweihander.description:
A blade that's been drenched in the blood of its opponents
until it rusted to the point of unwieldiness.
The rusting has left its weight balancing off-centre.

spatha.name: Spatha
spatha.description: A standard-issue blade of the Roman army

pushdagger.name: Push-dagger
pushdagger.description: A dagger that will fit neatly into your fist, allowing for a devestatingly lethal punch.

stiletto.name: Stiletto-dagger
stiletto.description:
A dagger favoured by assassins.
The blade is still stained from its last use.

hms_headsplitter.name: Headsman's Headsplitter
hms_headsplitter.description: A brutal and merciless axe, much like the man who wields it.

halberd.name: Halberd
halberd.description:
A midieval weapon favoured by all forms of law enforcement
for its superior reach and combination axe/spear tip.

tachi.name: Tachi
tachi.description:
A Japanese longsword.
Its sheath is adorned with most beautiful gold designs.

rusty_dragonslayer.name: Rusted Dragonslayer
rusty_dragonslayer.description:
Legend says this weapon was wielded by a man
who strengthened it fusing it with human blood and bone...
The blade eventually shattered, as if refusing to take part in such degeneracy;
What makes you think you have the right to revive this sinful weapon?

iron_will.name: Iron Will
iron_will.description:
I am a blade wrought of the wretchedness of my wielder's soul
and tempered in death.
I am a weapon. I am Iron Will.

leonidus_dory.name: Leonidus' Dory
leonidus_dory.description: A beautiful broadhead spear wielded by the mightiest king of Greece's strongest army

masamune.name: The Masamune
masamune.description: The most dazzling weapon of the finest swordsmith to ever live

gotz_zweihander.name: Gotz' Flammenschwert
gotz_zweihander.description:
A greatsword with a flamelike design on the blade.
Rumoured to be used by Gotz of The Iron Hand.

kusanagi.name: Kusanagi
kusanagi.description:
Legend says this weapon was used by a young man who ended humanity for the sake of his sister...
Or was it a man who ended it all for his daughter?
Time has a way of distorting such things.

muramasa.name: Muramasa
muramasa.description: A crimson-stained saber that cannot rust, no matter how much blood spilled by and on it

dragoon_lance.name: Dragoon's Lance
dragoon_lance.description:
A shimmering - golden symbol of the unbreakable bond between dragon and rider
Rumours say the owner of this lance doomed humanity after descending from the Heavens.
